title: Will riot do just VUs when theyre done with all their VGUs?
body:
I know riot has a long list of VGUs they still need yo go through but after that can they give VUs to the older champion models that dont need VGUs im talking the boxy clunky stiff champions that are still around whos kits dont require an update, as far as i know atleast.
Like maybe lux, ezreal, katarina, cho gath, anivia, janna and whoever else i cant really think of. 
As far as i know these champions arent on the list to get VGUs but their models seem outdated stiff and boxy to me i was just wondering if riot plans on doing something about that.
